Class EditPlayersController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.EditPlayersController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class EditPlayersController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Edit players controller. Allows the user to add, view as well as delete player profiles.
    Author:
    Josh Codd, Chi Hang Tse

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void generatePlayers()
      Gets all saved players.
      void handleAddPlayerClick()
      Handles add player button click by creating and saving a new player, with the name specified.
      void handleBack()
      Returns back to the menu.
      void handleDeleteClick()
      Deletes a selected player from file.
      void handleMute()
      Mutes the background audio if its currently un-muted, and un-mutes the background audio if it is currently muted.
      void initialize(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      Initializes the player editing GUI so that it's ready to be displayed.
      void setBackgroundMusic(javafx.scene.media.MediaView backgroundMusic)
      Sets the media (audio) to be played in the background of the menu.
      void setPrimaryStage(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
      Sets the stage in which the application is being displayed on.
